channel.title: Teleportation item

item.title: Teleportation item
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

Well i want it so when you pick up the blue party hat as the starter from the floor (via itemspawnpoints) it teleports you to varrock.

So far i’ve added

public void dunnotele() { if(!hasWhip()) { return false; } else if(hasWhip()) { teleportToX = 3252; teleportToY = 3436; return true; }

with

public boolean hasWhip() { if(playerHasItem2(6739) { return true; } return false; }

and get this error

client.java:36: illegal start of expression public void writePlayers1() { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Note: For all you noobs who say add an } above that, you’re wrong! if i do, i then get these 2 errors.

client.java:29: cannot return a value from method whose result type is void return false; ^ client.java:34: cannot return a value from method whose result type is void return true; ^

anyone got a clue?

Read full topic
